entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
